org.fao.oekc.agris.inputRecords.executor

Class DirectoryConverter

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.fao.oekc.agris.inputRecords.executor.DirectoryConverter

  • public class DirectoryConverter
extends java.lang.Object
    This object recursively looks inside a directory to parse files, calling the right parser for the source type of file (XML, Excel...). It takes parameters form org.fao.oekc.agris.inputRecords.MainInputRecords and executes the job.
    Author:
    celli

      Called by org.fao.oekc.agris.inputRecords.MainInputRecords

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void convertDir(java.io.File sourceDir)
      Look for XML, Excel files in the current directory, calling a Runnable to parse each one

        spf - SAXParserFactory
        executor - a FixedThreadPool
        arnPrefix - 3rd + 2nd + 4th parameter
        sourceFormat - 6th command line parameter
        outpurDir - sourceDit (1st parameter) + "/OUTPUT"

        lines - could be null if 7th parameter is empty
        titles - empty list for internal duplicates removal
